Great game! The graphics are easy to run and lower settings don't completely destroy visual quality. Gameplay can get a little annoying with hackers in deathmatch and in non-prime matches, but it is really fun to play, especially with friends.
Surprised they still update this game and not afraid to change things up too, Very nice!

Com milhares de jogadores no mundo todo e um cenário competitivo mundial muito forte, honra o legado de seu antecessor que marcou toda uma época e revolucionou o gênero. Counter-Strike: Global-Offensive será eternizado sem dúvidas como um dos melhores FPS da história.
Still a strong competitive game after as many years as it's existed.

fun with friends casual is full of cheaters comp in the eu is horrible unless queuing in two or more otherwise you get kicked the skins  are the best part of this game if you enjoy arguing with teammates in a comp game while memeing with m8's on discord it will be fun for you
